text: Hi folks. You may have seen this in other channels. Monday, HubSpot announced the acquisition of PieSync. The highest-reviewed data syncing iPaaS. You can learn more about how HubSpot and PieSync will work together, along with some thoughts from our leadership in this forum post here: <https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/APIs-Integrations/We-ve-Acquired-PieSync-the-Highest-Reviewed-Data-Syncing-iPaaS/m-p/300677>
